content: Stick to the path, as it curves around to the left. You'll enter a cave, with columns of ruins visible and lava all over the place.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Stick to the path, as it curves around to the left. You'll enter a cave, with columns of ruins visible and lava all over the place.
